hero.headline: Turn AI CX strategy into audited, production-ready outcomes.
hero.body: Go from kickoff to production in 6 weeks—with governance that passes compliance on day one.
points: Voice and chat agents that resolve issues—not frustrate customers
Integrates with your existing CCaaS and CRM—no rip-and-replace
Governance that satisfies compliance before launch

value.noteText: = kickoff to production release of the first automation wave.

media.title: From intake to trusted launch—then continuous optimization.
media.body: A closed-loop program that clears compliance, accelerates delivery, and feeds performance data into the next wave.
media.graphicLabel: Governed delivery loop with five stages and a return arrow
steps: Governance gates embedded before build starts
Security, privacy, and legal approvals tracked in-flow
Post-launch performance feeds the next release cycle
media.caption: An enterprise loop: audit-ready at launch, measurable after.

hero.utility: Enterprise + SMB CX programs delivered across NA & LATAM.

trust.label: Trusted by CX teams at 30+ organizations including:

services.title: Three service pillars that keep CX modernization moving.
services.description: Modular pillars—engage for the full lifecycle or plug specific gaps.

cards.title: Advisory Lab
cards.description: Know exactly which AI bets will pay off—before you spend a dollar on implementation.

cards.title: Build Studio
cards.description: Go from approved design to production agent in 8 weeks—with observability built in.
cards.artifacts: Safety cases, data contracts, QA scorecards

cards.title: Operate Office
cards.description: Keep your AI program on track with fractional leadership that ensures adoption sticks.
cards.artifacts: KPI cockpit, escalation paths, training kits

solutions.title: Proven outcomes you can deploy in weeks.
solutions.description: Repeatable plays ready to deploy—use as-is or customize.

cards.title: Automated service desk
cards.body: Voice and digital flows that authenticate customers, surface answers, and escalate with full context.

cards.title: Guided selling & retention
cards.body: Agentic copilots that recommend offers, coach agents, and trigger workflows inside CRM.

cards.title: Back-office automation
cards.body: Case triage, data collection, and notifications spanning ERP, ticketing, and custom APIs.

cards.title: Feedback & analytics
cards.body: Survey orchestration, insight pipelines, and KPI dashboards tied to business impact.

smb.title: Enterprise-grade AI sized for lean budgets.
smb.description: Same rigor, faster pace, friendlier price—built for teams ready to scale.

cards.title: 90-day automation lift
cards.body: Rapid discovery, pre-built intent libraries, and packaged integrations that snap into your existing helpdesk and CRM.

cards.title: Shared delivery pod
cards.body: Blend your internal ops team with DBX engineers to design, build, and govern cross-channel AI journeys.

cards.title: Fractional PS + analytics
cards.body: Monthly sprints that prioritize roadmap health, KPI instrumentation, and change management for evolving SMB orgs.

cards.title: Fraud triage + secure messaging
cards.body: Loan status, collections coaching, fraud triage, and encrypted client servicing with audit trails.

cards.title: Care navigation copilots
cards.body: Intake, benefits checks, Rx reminders, and omnichannel patient routing with PHI guardrails.

cards.title: Conversational commerce
cards.body: Order management, loyalty, warranties, and guided selling tied to live inventory.

cards.title: Irregular ops control tower
cards.body: Itinerary servicing, disruption comms, and loyalty concierge with 24/7 agent assist.

process.title: Four tightly managed phases.
process.body: No handoffs. No finger-pointing. DBX Solutions stays accountable from kickoff through adoption.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.body: Interviews, data diagnostics, and ROI scoring to stack-rank opportunities.

steps.title: Design
steps.body: Journey flows, safety rails, and proof points validated with stakeholders.

steps.title: Build & Integrate
steps.body: Implementation across channels, data, and tooling with observability baked in.

steps.title: Measure & Adopt
steps.body: Enablement, runbooks, and governance cadences that institutionalize outcomes and prep the next wave.

process.optionsTitle: Plug DBX Solutions where you need it.

options.title: Acceleration Sprint
options.body: 3-week war room to unblock or relaunch a stalled CX GenAI initiative.

options.title: Fractional PS Lead
options.body: Part-time Professional Services leadership to steer roadmap + governance.

options.title: Launch Assurance
options.body: Readiness reviews, risk desk, and day-0 response plan for enterprise launches.

options.title: Advisory Retainer
options.body: Quarterly strategic partner for roadmap prioritization and exec reporting.

proof.title: Proof that the work lands.

testimonials.quote: DBX unified our sales engineering, delivery, and customer success into one motion. We launched our AI messaging program in 8 weeks—2 months ahead of schedule.
testimonials.author: Sarah M., VP Customer Experience

testimonials.quote: They parachuted into a stalled automation program and had our compliance, data, and CX teams aligned in two working sessions. The pilot hit 28% deflection without harming CSAT.
testimonials.author: Carlos R., Head of Contact Center

proof.cta: See how we can help your team

contact.title: Ready to explore what's possible?
contact.body: Whether you're just exploring AI automation or ready to launch, we'll respond within 24 hours. No sales pressure—just a conversation about your goals.
